document_data.name: Lhendreths
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Lhendreths''' were a cabal in [[Saerloon]] in [[Sembia]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''Beware [[Kormoroth]] and [[Yestrel]] and the Lhendreths of Saerloon.''|Last words of Lord [[Olgarth Oldbridle]], {{yearlink|1492}}}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to the servant [[Osbur]], his Lord [[Olgarth Oldbridle]] left him with a warning for his son, [[Elbert Oldbridle]], should he die. Said warning concerned the presence of Sembian cabals seeking power by means of subverting courtiers and specifically mentioned the Lhendreths of Saerloon.
